ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Look for the green seal that says USDA Organic.
sentences.chinese: 寻找标有“美国农业部有机”的绿色图章。

sentences.english: A changing climate is adding pressure to the already-stressed agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化正在增加农业部门已经承受的压力。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony was moderated by Du Qinglin, Minister of Agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式由农业部部长杜青林主持。

sentences.english: USDA agency ruled on the most popular variety of Roundup Ready sugar beets.
sentences.chinese: 美国农业部相关部门对最常见的抗农达甜菜做出裁决。

sentences.english: Buy only pasteurized egg products that bear the USDA inspection mark.
sentences.chinese: 只买农业部检查标记过的巴氏杀菌蛋。

sentences.english: Development and manufacture of products for military-industrial complex and agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 军工业和农业部门产品的开发和制造。

sentences.english: China's ministries of commerce and agriculture have moved to stabilize the vegetable market after hearing the report.
sentences.chinese: 其后，中国农业部和商业部紧急部署稳定蔬菜市场。

sentences.english: China's Minister of Agriculture Du Qinglin confirmed the extension.
sentences.chinese: 中国农业部长杜青林确认了延期一事。

sentences.english: Ministries of Agriculture have not generally participated in formal climate change discussions.
sentences.chinese: 农业部门没有普遍的参与到气候变化的讨论中来。

sentences.english: Mr. Weirich, the agriculture secretary, said he was skeptical about that.
sentences.chinese: 农业部长维里奇先生说，他怀疑这一点。

sentences.english: Agriculture officials say four million rice farmers have registered for the new scheme.
sentences.chinese: 泰国农业部官员说，有400万稻农加入这项新方案。

sentences.english: The USDA also protects natural resources and promotes food safety.
sentences.chinese: 美国农业部还保护天然资源并提倡食品安全。

sentences.english: He said it was the company'sdecision to give them up and stop research. The USDA inspected the site this week and has started a formal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 美国农业部本周视察了现场，并已开始正式调查。

sentences.english: In the early 1900s, the U.S. Department of Agriculture faced a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 世纪初，美国农业部面临一项挑战。

sentences.english: However, Agriculture Minister Aigner comment on this topic in reservations.
sentences.chinese: 不过，农业部长艾格纳在置评这一议题时持保留态度。

sentences.english: Scientists from the University of Illinois and the United States Department of Agriculture did the study.
sentences.chinese: 利诺伊大学和美国农业部的科学家们对此进行了研究。
